measureBothEars.Description: If true, measure both ears, using channels SMICR0 (left) and SMICR1 (right).

skip.description: Allows user to skip the response area.

autoSubmit.description: Go straight to next page once this page is complete.

autoBegin.description: Go straight into exam, without having to press the 'Begin' button.

delay.description: delay, in ms, between autobegin and actual start of exam

displayType.description: Style of TOB. MPANL is the legacy version of TOB that displays limits on the bar graph and Vanilla will have no markings on the bar graph and display a table.

name.description: The standard name, i.e. ANSI MPANL

examInstructions.description: Replaces the top-level instruction text on the CHA exam pages (each page after starting page)

BufferLength.description: Minimum number of samples to consider for third octave result. (samples) Note the CHA may use more samples than specified.
